page.title: 05EDUCATION GILWERN CP SCHOOL
page.content: The present Gilwern C.P. School building was opened on the 26 January 1973, by Lady Watkins of Glyntawe. The school building is extremely modern.About 220 children attend school.There are 5 teachers in the Junior Department and 4 in the Infant Department.There is also a headmaster and a secretary.School starts at 9.00 a.m. and finishes at 3.45 p.m. At lunch time there are 5 dinner ladies and 5 supervisors.The school has large playing fields,on which are football and rugby pitches.There are three yards a girls'yard,boys'yard and an infants'yard.The boys'yard also serves as a netball court.Sometimes the school is used by the public in the evenings for various classes.
